actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committee on the Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

official_title: A bill to establish the position of Assistant United States Trade Representative for Small Business, and for other purposes.
subjects: Office of the U.S. Trade Representative

summary.text: Small Business Enhancement Act of 2001 - Directs the U.S. Trade Representative to establish a new position of Assistant U.S. Trade Representative for Small Business to promote exports by small businesses and remove foreign impediments to the success of such undertakings.Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to require the Director of the Congressional Budget Office, to the extent practicable, to prepare for each reported public bill or resolution a small business cost analysis.

titles.title: A bill to establish the position of Assistant United States Trade Representative for Small Business, and for other purposes.
